content:
have h := congrArg (denote ctx) h
  simp [denote_flat, denote_sort] at h
  assumption
theorem ex₁ (x₁ x₂ x₃ x₄ : Nat) : (x₁ + x₂) + (x₃ + x₄) = x₁ + x₂ + x₃ + x₄ :=
  Expr.eq_of_flat
    { op      := Nat.add
      assoc   := Nat.add_assoc
      comm    := Nat.add_comm
      vars    := [x₁, x₂, x₃, x₄],
      someVal := x₁ }
